title: [SUGGESTION] DELETING & RENAMING THE GENERAL TAB IN THE FRIENDSLIST
body: Since the addition of folders some people (like myself) have started using these folders, now me general folder is just sitting there at the bottom of my friends list |GENERAL 0/0| <--- just like that maybe make it so we can rename it? or delete it? {{champion:74}}

replies.body: That's were your friends go when u first friend them so it makes sense it's still there but they could also make an option to change your default friends list.
